subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards, who had a controversy-filled season, were rewarded for their suffering when they won the No. 1 pick in the N.B.A. draft — and the chance to draft the Kentucky point guard John Wall.
snippet: The Washington Wizards, who had a controversy-filled season, were rewarded for their suffering when they won the No. 1 pick in the N.B.A. draft — and the chance to draft the Kentucky point guard John Wall.
